miniapp.name: Global Profile Map
miniapp.subtitle: Connect with Farcaster users worldwide
miniapp.description: Interactive global map where Farcaster users can add their profile pins by paying 0.5 USDC on Base Network. Discover profiles from around the world and connect with the community.
miniapp.tagline: Pin yourself on the global Farcaster map
miniapp.ogDescription: Join the global Farcaster community map. Pay 0.5 USDC to add your profile pin and connect with users worldwide.
